location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:187 x 150 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘35’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of a narrow street in Baghdad, with children and adults in the foreground looking towards the camera. The buildings on either side of the street are made of brick and feature projecting mashrabiyyas of wood and metal.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'View in Bagdad.'
